# StepActorLikes.applyPagination() method

Applies pagination to retrieve likes and sets the output. Fetches paginated results using the agent and appends them to the output.

**Signature:**

```typescript
applyPagination(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
